Hello,      
     
I use the following code to embedding Heritrix to my   
=
web-application:     
     
try {     
  Heritrix heritrix =3D new Heritrix=
(true);    
  heritrix.addCrawlJob(   
    "path/to/order.xml",   
    "job=
_name",   
    "job_description",   
    "seeds.txt");   
     
  heritrix.=
start();   
  heritrix.startCrawling();   
   
  CrawlJobHandler handler =
=3D heritrix.getJobHandler();   
  while (handler.isCrawling()) {   
    /*=
 some actions */  
  }   
    
} catch (Exception ex) {    
  logger.error(=
 "Error: ", ex );    
}    
   
The problem is that I get an empty 'crawl.l=
og' file. It seems that   
Heritrix creates all the necessary directories, =
but does not perform   
crawling.   
   
Heritrix ver. 1.12.1.    
Does any=
body have an idea to solve the problem?   
Thanks.   
   
Regards,   
Artem=
.
